meaningMnemonic: At the top of the <radical>mountain</radical> is a <radical>signpost</radical> to tell you you've reached the <kanji>summit</kanji>. Literally every mountain that humans have reached the top of has one of these summit signs.
readingMnemonic: At the <kanji>summit</kanji>, you decide to build your new <reading>ho</reading>me (ほう). It's been destroyed so many times, and you're sick of it. Maybe if you build you home at the summit of this mountain it will be safer.
